page.title: 12INDUSTRY(COAL MINING)
page.content: Rufford Colliery was sunk between 1911 and 1913 by the Bolsover Colliery Co. After nationalisation major reconstrct -ion took place between 1953 and 1955. In the early 1960's two drifts were opened to High Hazel's seam.In 1972 two more drifts were opened.Methane gas is drawn to the surface by vacuum pumps,and a surface methane plant supplies gas to fire a boiler plant which provides heat for the surface buildings.The coal preparation plant washes and grades the coal,the dirt removed being spread and consolidated on the dirt tip.Over 60% of output goes to the steel industry,the rest to the house coal market.The coal faces are highly mechanised.Sccessful operat -ion depends on high standards of skill,technical ability and machine operation and maintenance(see page 20).
